bullets: FREE online tool to create your own custom quote.
Friendly, honest customer service from our Ergeon team!
Beautiful fence built by our skilled local contractors.

Yelp.description: They were so professional throughout the whole process. Ergeon did all the leg work since I work all week this was great. They listened to all my concerns and needs. I have nothing bad to say and I am very critical when it comes to services. The fence is beautiful. I have and will continue to recommend them to anyone who needs fence services. Use them you will be taken care of.
Yelp.name: Rachel C.
Yelp.title: Ergeon did all the leg work, they were so professional throughout the whole process.

Google.description: Ergeon did a fantastic job and flawlessly handled the entire process.  Now having worked with them twice in the last four months (previously for a concrete driveway and most recently for new fencing), we highly recommend working with Ergeon!

faq.side-yard: 8 feet, 3 feet on street side setback
faq.setback: 3 feet from the property line or sidewalk on street side yard (this requirement shall not apply to a fence that was lawfully constructed prior to November 6, 2006, which may be replaced in the same location)

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
